bibl.title: Unfired Pottery from Ceramic Workshops at Tell Atrib. - Appendix: Malgorzata DASZKIEWICZ and Jerzy RAABE, The Clay and Unfired Ceramic Fragments from Tell Atrib - Preliminary Report on Technological Investigations.
bibl.note: Clay vessels, formed but unfired, discovered inside the rooms with kilns (IIIth-IInd cent. B.C.). - Pp. 302-310: Appendix: Chemical analyses.
